item.title: 1.5 Hour (20 miles) Waverunner Tour. See Mangrove Tunnels, 20 Islands & SandBar
item.description: Islamorada is one of Florida’s most stunning areas as it encompasses six of the Florida Keys but exploring on your own can be difficult if you don’t want to rent a way to get around. Instead, book this Islamorada WaveRunner Tour that takes you out easily through the water where free time to ride is also built into the tour.

image.alt: 1.5 Hour (20 miles) Waverunner Tour. See Mangrove Tunnels, 20 Islands & SandBar

item.title: Private 3-Hour Islamorada Sandbar Tour
item.description: Take a break from hopping around the Florida Keys and hop around Islamorada’s sunny and bars instead. Bring the bar with you as you slide onto a tiki boat with a cooler ready to chill your favorite beverages. Drop anchor at a sandbar and choose how you want to relax by either sipping on a cold drink atop the custom surfboard bar or jumping into the water for a refreshing swim.

image.alt: Private 3-Hour Islamorada Sandbar Tour

item.title: 4 Hour Private Ecotour and Snorkeling Boat Tour
item.description: The Florida Keys are surrounded by sparkling water and dazzling coral reefs and this half-day private eco-tour allows you to explore the serene side of the ocean. You’ll hop in a boat with a USCG-licensed captain for a ride into the mangroves lining the islands. Look for wildlife from the boat deck then slide on a snorkeling mask and dive into the water to get a closer look.

image.alt: 4 Hour Private Ecotour and Snorkeling Boat Tour

item.title: Private 2 hour Mangrove Ecotour
item.description: For one of the best ways to see manatees, dolphins, sharks, tropical fish, saltwater crocodiles, and more in the Florida Keys, book this private, hassle-free boat tour in Islamorada. Your captain takes you expertly through the mangroves, navigating the waters and sharing their knowledge with you. Ask all your questions, relax on board, and keep your eyes peeled for all sorts of marine and bird life.

image.alt: Private 2 hour Mangrove Ecotour

item.title: Day Tour Glass Bottom Boat In Islamorada

image.alt: Day Tour Glass Bottom Boat In Islamorada

item.title: Half Day Private Boat Tour
item.description: Explore the beautiful scenery around Islamorada with ease on this half-day private boat tour: hop around to the mangrove islands and channels around the key and look for wildlife such as dolphins, manatees, and crocodiles; snorkel at Alligator Lighthouse Reef or Cheeca Rocks with the provided gear; and soak up the sun and relax at a local sandbar.

image.alt: Half Day Private Boat Tour

item.title: Private Islamorada Sunset Cruise
item.description: Enjoy the sunset as you cruise on your private pontoon boat on the bay side of Islamorada, and keep your eyes peeled for dolphins. Your captain takes care of navigation so you can just relax. Use provided coolers stocked with ice to put your own beverages in. Relax, drink in hand, as you watch the sunset. Then do some dancing under the disco ball if you like.

image.alt: Private Islamorada Sunset Cruise

item.title: Half Day Private Charter
item.description: Our all inclusive package comes with a Unites States Coast Guard licensed captain with many years of experience, these captains have been hand picked by me to insure you have the ultimate time on the water, fuel and docking fees are also included. While you are enjoying your time at the sandbar we pull out the floaties, paddle board, and even a BBQ, there will already be a cooler onboard with ice and water, you are more than welcome to bring your drinks of choice. We offer a half day charter out to an amazing Lighthouse with crystal clear water!

image.alt: Half Day Private Charter

item.title: Golden Glare Fishing Charter with Experienced Captain
item.description: Anglers with an eye for Tarpon, this fishing trip is for you. Enjoy a private chartered fishing charter for two that’s focused on the Tarpon migration between Everglades National Park and the Florida Keys. Your captain will give you a quick lesson of the techniques you need to hunt for these species and cruise you to his favorite fishing holes. Water, fuel, bait and cleaning, a fish license, and your rods and tackle are included.

image.alt: Golden Glare Fishing Charter with Experienced Captain

item.title: Islamorada Florida Keys Sunset Sightseeing Cruise Music
item.description: Sunset boat tour from Islamorada to the bay side of the island offers a delightful blend of natural beauty and glimpses into the opulent lifestyle of the wealthy. As the boat gracefully navigates the waters, it passes by a collection of magnificent homes that line the waterfront. These millionaire residences stand as testaments to architectural grandeur, boasting sprawling estates with manicured lawns, palm-fringed driveways, and private docks adorned with luxurious yachts. The tour allows glimpses into the lavish lifestyles led by the fortunate few, as their elegant homes overlook the glistening bay. The tour seamlessly weaves together the allure of nature's spectacle and the captivating allure of exclusive real estate, offering a truly unforgettable experience for those seeking a taste of both worlds.

image.alt: Islamorada Florida Keys Sunset Sightseeing Cruise Music

item.title: 2 Hour Sunset Eco-Cruise
item.description: Explore the last hours of daylight in nature by exploring the mangroves of Islamorada by boat with our expert guides in search for all the wildlife it hosts such as dolphins, manatees, crocodiles, nesting birds and more. Let us help you unwind and enjoy the beauty the Florida Keys is known for. This is the perfect cruise for celebrating an engagement, anniversary, birthday, and even just a wonderful day.

image.alt: 2 Hour Sunset Eco-Cruise

item.title: Private Full-Day Tour of Florida Keys from Miami Key Largo to Key West
item.description: Make the most of your time in the Florida Keys by booking this private tour, guaranteeing you won’t miss any of the top sites, or more hidden ones, all the way from Miami Key Largo to Key West. There’s no need to hassle with maps or directions. Your guide drives you between sites, stopping anywhere along the way that interests you. Get some great options for restaurants along the way, too.

image.alt: Private Full-Day Tour of Florida Keys from Miami Key Largo to Key West

item.title: Night Tour Glass Bottom Boat in Islamorada
item.description:
The glass bottom boat give special viewing access to reefs such as Cheeca Rocks, Alligator Reef, Caloosa Rocks and more. Our educated guides tell you everything you want to know about the underwater world beneath your feet.
Join us aboard our beautiful, brand new, Seakeeper stabilized 46-foot glass bottom boat Transparensea!

image.alt: Night Tour Glass Bottom Boat in Islamorada

item.title: Islamorada Florida Sunset Cruise Tour
item.description:
We operate from the finest resorts in Islamorada so our reputation is top notch! We're the only company that includes beer and wine products for guest convience! Our powered catamarans offer the room and stability to mingle and catch different island views
**prices includes sales tax** Adult- 21+ Youth- 13-20 (must be 21 to consume alcohol) Child- 4-12 Toddlers- 3 & under
More trips available through our website!

image.alt: Islamorada Florida Sunset Cruise Tour

item.title: Islamorada Snorkel / Sandbar / Sunset / Fishing Charters & Tours
item.description:
Customize however you’d like!
The Alligator Reef Lighthouse in Islamorada is world famous for its breathtaking clear/blue water! There are thousands of colorful fish and coral to see! This is a private charter for up to 6 people. We have all snorkel equipment.
World Famous Islamorada Sandbar: -Head straight to the Islamorada Sandbar to swim, float, and enjoy your favorite beverages!
Restaurants / bar hop
Eco Tour

image.alt: Islamorada Snorkel / Sandbar / Sunset / Fishing Charters & Tours

item.title: Snorkeling Adventure in Islamorada
item.description: Enjoy a 2 hour snorkel tour in Islamorada from the Cheeca Hotel on a 49-passenger catamaran in unforgettable underwater adventure. The catamaran glides through the waters, offering breathtaking views as passengers anticipate the magic that awaits below. Equipped with gear, dive into the crystal-clear waters, where we will encounter vibrant coral reefs, tropical fish, & a kaleidoscope of marine life. Explore the underwater wonders, finding moments of serenity & awe as you swim at your own pace. After the snorkeling experience, relax on the catamaran & enjoy the scenic journey back, reminiscing about the incredible sights & creating memories that will last a lifetime.

image.alt: Snorkeling Adventure in Islamorada

item.title: Kayak through the Mangroves of Tavernier Creek
item.description:
Discover the magic of the Florida Keys on our exhilarating natural ocean and mangrove tour. Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of Tavernier Creek, navigate through enchanting mangrove tunnels, and explore the shimmering waters of a picturesque saltwater lagoon.
This three-hour guided tour offers a unique opportunity to encounter the diverse wildlife that calls this paradise home. Glide past gentle manatees, catch glimpses of vibrant green iguanas basking in the sun, and marvel at the sleek movements of lemon- and reef sharks. Keep an eye out for the charming mangrove tree crabs, and be captivated by the myriad of birds soaring above and the colorful fish swimming below.
Your guide, Jade, has always harbored a deep love for the ocean and is passionately dedicated to preserving the delicate ecosystem of the Florida Keys. His extensive knowledge about the evolution of the mangrove forest will enrich your experience, and he is always eager to answer any questions you may have.

image.alt: Kayak through the Mangroves of Tavernier Creek

item.title: Islamorada: Whale Harbor Sandbar
item.description:
Join us for a unique 2.5-hour Whale Harbor Sandbar tour that offers swimming, an open bar, & breathtaking scenery.
Dive into the inviting waters and enjoy a refreshing swim at the sandbar. Sip on refreshing beverages of your choice while surrounded by the stunning natural beauty of the sandbar.
Set sail across the turquoise waters & take in the breathtaking coastal views along the way. Sit back, relax, and let our crew take care of all the details for a worry-free and memorable experience.
The sandbar itself offers a tranquil & serene atmosphere. Enjoy the natural beauty of the surroundings, soak up the sun, & feel the ocean breeze. It's a perfect opportunity to unwind & escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.
This tour combines relaxation, exploration, and delightful refreshments.

image.alt: Islamorada: Whale Harbor Sandbar

item.title: Islamorada Fishing Activity and Sandbar trips
item.description: ON THE REEL CHARTER Is a 35ft SeaVEE twin 400hp mercury verados engine that is well maintained with all safety features to code and JL AUDIO MARINE SYSTEM. Also, we use top tackle and innovative techniques to conjure beasts from the depths. We offer: DEEP SEA FISHING, WRECK FISHING, AND INSHORE FISHING ALSO, SUNDOWN CRUISES AND SANDBAR TRIPS UP TO 6 PEOPLE FOR ALL TRIPS.

image.alt: Islamorada Fishing Activity and Sandbar trips

item.title: 31' Private Boat Charter Rental - Islamorada W/Capt up to 13ppl
item.description:
Our captains, boats, and fact we customize every trip to every clients dream day is what sets us apart and why we dominate other charter companies. There is a reason people stay at the Ritz-Carlton, though there is a motel 6 right up the road, and that's the type of experience we aim to provide.
Discover the magic of Islamorada aboard a luxurious private boat charter, accommodating up to 13 guests. Perfect for a range of activities—snorkeling, exploring local sandbars, island-hopping, or even a special proposal—our boat offers something for everyone.
Features: ⇛ Bathroom ⇛ Bluetooth / AUX audio ⇛ Children's & Infant Life Jackets ⇛ Cooler / Ice Chest ⇛ Deck / Washdown Shower ⇛ Enclosed Cabin to escape the sun, weather, or just take a break ⇛ Large Sunpad to Sunbathe ⇛ Refrigerator ⇛ Stateroom for Infants & Children to Lay Down ⇛ Sunroof ⇛ Swim ladder
Join us for a trip by booking today!

image.alt: 31' Private Boat Charter Rental - Islamorada W/Capt up to 13ppl

item.title: Original Snorkel and Sandbar Combo in Islamorada
item.description: We're the original public snorkel & sandbar trip! We've been in business in the Keys since 2010. Our crew is the best in the business!

image.alt: Original Snorkel and Sandbar Combo in Islamorada

item.title: Half Day Private Tour to Islamorada Alligator Reef and Sandbar
item.description: One of Islamorada’s best treasures, the sandbar and Alligator Reef Light House accessible by water Transportation is by boats you will see lounge chairs, barbecue grills, picnic table, umbrellas, all submersed in the water. The sandbar is a great spot for all ages, and even welcomes our four legged friends.

image.alt: Half Day Private Tour to Islamorada Alligator Reef and Sandbar

item.title: Half Day Christ of the abyss tour with Snorkel Equipments
item.description: Enjoy the Thrill of the open sea and the comfort of top class amenities, ideal for sunbathing, sightseeing or simply relaxing with your group exploring Snorkeling to the Christ of the Abyss drive to Dry Rocks Reef, home of the World Famous Christ of the Abyss Statue

image.alt: Half Day Christ of the abyss tour with Snorkel Equipments
